implementation.functions: function initialize (lul_device) if (package.path:find ("/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua", 1, true) == nil) then package.path = package.path .. ";/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua" end package.loaded.L_CurrentCostEnviR1 = nil cc_plugin = require ("L_CurrentCostEnviR1") cc_plugin.initialize (lul_device) end
